quotes.quote: Every thought you produce, anything you say, any action you do, it bears your signature.
A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
You had only one chance for a signature in life, but most people left no impression.
Every person has a signature. Just some people don't know it yet.
If you want to have a golden signature, create a good art!
The difference between a signature and an autograph is that the second one has higher face value on a plain paper than the first one even on a cheque.
The signature of our eyes, in other words, the way we look never changes even at the age of hundred!
The signature of mediocrity is chronic inconsistency.
The signature of a truly enviable woman is the tenacity and continuity of her women friends.
We always search for the signature of God to prove His existence. And now I say unto you that Art is His very signature!
When you wear your signature scent, you feel something special from within.
Smiling face of every little girl is the signature of God’s presence.
One of the trademarks of a champion is that he can outlast you.
